perturbation.original_text: That fee shall be payable at the Closing Time upon the closing of the sale of the Offered Shares, and may be deducted by the Agents from the gross proceeds of the Offering.
perturbation.changed_text: That fee shall be payable within 30 days of the Closing Time upon the closing of the sale of the Offered Shares, and may be deducted by the Agents from the gross proceeds of the Offering.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict regarding the payment deadline for the Agents' Fee. The original text implies immediate payment at the Closing Time. The modified text states payment is due within 30 days of the Closing Time. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: (b) Delivery of Certificates (i) The Agents shall have received at the Closing Time a certificate dated the Closing Date, addressed to the Agents (and, if necessary for opinion purposes, counsel to the Agents) and signed by officers of the Corporation acceptable to the Agents, acting reasonably, with respect to the constating documents of the Corporation, no proceedings to voluntarily wind-up or dissolve, all resolutions of the board of directors of the Corporation relating to this Agreement and the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the incumbency and specimen signatures of signing officers of the Corporation and such other matters as the Agents may reasonably request.
perturbation.changed_text: (b) Delivery of Certificates (i) The Agents shall have received within 10 business days after the Closing Date a certificate dated the Closing Date, addressed to the Agents (and, if necessary for opinion purposes, counsel to the Agents) and signed by officers of the Corporation acceptable to the Agents, acting reasonably, with respect to the constating documents of the Corporation, no proceedings to voluntarily wind-up or dissolve, all resolutions of the board of directors of the Corporation relating to this Agreement and the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the incumbency and specimen signatures of signing officers of the Corporation and such other matters as the Agents may reasonably request.
perturbation.explanation: This modification introduces a contradiction regarding when the certificate needs to be received. Initially, it had to be received at Closing Time, but now it must be received within 10 days of the Closing Date. This creates potential ambiguity if the closing is delayed, or if other clauses refer to actions contingent on receipt at Closing Time.

perturbation.original_text: The Agents' Fee shall be apportioned among the Agents as follows: Dundee Securities Ltd. 40% Kes 7 Capital Inc. 30% Bloom Burton & Co. Ltd. 30% 100%
perturbation.changed_text: The Agents' Fee shall be apportioned among the Agents as follows: Dundee Securities Ltd. 30% Kes 7 Capital Inc. 40% Bloom Burton & Co. Ltd. 30% 100%
perturbation.explanation: This modification introduces a contradiction regarding the apportionment percentages of the agents' fee. The original text states Dundee gets 40% and Kes 7 gets 30%, while the modified text reverses those percentages. This creates a conflict of interest among the agents, and is inconsistent with previous and subsequent sections of the document.
